title: Kelly film
creator_credit: John Bird, Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Stephen Radic
brief_description: A short musical, with songs in the style of Gilbert and Sullivan and early Australian folk, about a bank clerk who believes himself to be Ned Kelly. Stars Peter O’Shea, Howard Stanley and Jude Hewitson. Songs written and performed by Stephen Radic.
creator_credit_for_label: John Bird, Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Stephen Radic
